introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to ft_transcendence Pong. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our multiplayer Pong game platform. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency in our data practices.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.service: Providing and maintaining the game service
usage.social: Enabling friend connections and social features

security.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
security.text: Your data is stored securely using encrypted databases. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Passwords are hashed and never stored in plain text. JWT tokens are used for secure session management.

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.text: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. Your username and game statistics may be visible to other users through leaderboards and friend features. We may share data only when required by law or to protect our rights.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.access: Access and view your personal data through your profile
rights.update: Update or correct your account information
rights.delete: Request deletion of your account and associated data
rights.visibility: Manage friend connections and visibility settings

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.text: We use essential cookies and local storage mechanisms solely for authentication purposes and maintaining your session. No tracking cookies or third-party analytics are used.

fairplay.text: We are committed to maintaining a fair gaming environment. Any form of cheating, match-fixing, or exploitation of bugs will result in immediate account suspension or permanent ban. Tournament results may be voided if fair play violations are detected.
